an5.90:4.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattanti.
an5.90:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu bahukicco hoti bahukaraṇīyo viyatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu;
an5.90:4.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu appamattakena kammena divasaṃ atināmeti;
an5.90:5.3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu saṃsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena;
an5.90:6.3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu akālena gāmaṃ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati;
an5.90:7.3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu yāyaṃ kathā ābhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā, seyyathidaṃ—
an5.90:8.2: appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṃsaggakathā vīriyārambhakathā sīlakathā samādhikathā paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā, evarūpiyā kathāya na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
an5.90:8.4: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:8.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattanti.
an5.90:9.1: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattanti.
an5.90:9.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na bahukicco hoti na bahukaraṇīyo viyatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu;
an5.90:9.4: na riñcati paṭisallānaṃ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṃ cetosamathaṃ.
an5.90:9.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na appamattakena kammena divasaṃ atināmeti;
an5.90:10.2: na riñcati paṭisallānaṃ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṃ cetosamathaṃ.
an5.90:10.3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu asaṃsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena;
an5.90:11.2: na riñcati paṭisallānaṃ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṃ cetosamathaṃ.
an5.90:11.3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na atikālena gāmaṃ pavisati, nātidivā paṭikkamati;
an5.90:12.2: na riñcati paṭisallānaṃ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṃ cetosamathaṃ.
an5.90:12.3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu yāyaṃ kathā ābhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā, seyyathidaṃ—
an5.90:13.2: appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṃsaggakathā vīriyārambhakathā sīlakathā samādhikathā paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā, evarūpiyā kathāya nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.90:13.3: na riñcati paṭisallānaṃ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṃ cetosamathaṃ.
an5.90:13.4: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattati.
an5.90:13.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
